snippet: President Obama and his party shattered the election cycle’s fund-raising record with a $181 million t0tal for September, Mr. Obama’s campaign said on Saturday.
abstract: President Obama and his party shattered the election cycle’s fund-raising record with a $181 million t0tal for September, Mr. Obama’s campaign said on Saturday.

headline.main: Obama and Democrats Raise $181 Million in September
headline.print_headline: Democrats Raise a Record Amount of Money in September
